dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaints
dmca.body:
Google, Inc.
Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA [private]

FAX: [private] Atn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA complaints

October 8, 2007

Notice Pursuant to Digital Millennium Copyright Act

This request is made for removal of 11 pages that permit unauthorized downloads of Nolo copyrighted intellectual property.

1. The copyrighted work that is being infringed is Living Together: A Legal Guide, which is being offered for free at the blog entitled LivingTogetherALegalGuide.

The specific posts are:

http://livingtogetheralegalguide.blogspot.com/2007/03/chapter-1-living-together-introducion.html: March 9, 2007

http://livingtogetheralegalguide.blogspot.com/2007/03/chapter-2-legal-state-of-living.html: March 9, 2007

http://livingtogetheralegalguide.blogspot.com/2007/03/chapter-3-living-together-agreements.html: March 9, 2007

http://livingtogetheralegalguide.blogspot.com/2007/03/chapter-4-debt-credit-taxes-and-more.html: March 9, 2007

http://livingtogetheralegalguide.blogspot.com/2007/03/chapter-5-renting-and-sharing-home.html: March 9, 2007

http://livingtogetheralegalguide.blogspot.com/2007/03/chapter-6-buying-house-together.html: March 9, 2007

http://livingtogetheralegalguide.blogspot.com/2007/03/chapter-7-starting-family.html: March 9, 2007

http://livingtogetheralegalguide.blogspot.com/2007/03/chapter-8-you-and-your-ex-spouse-and.html: March 9, 2007

http://livingtogetheralegalguide.blogspot.com/2007/03/c-h-p-t-e-r-9-wills-and-estate-planning.html: March 9, 2007

http://livingtogetheralegalguide.blogspot.com/2007/03/lawyers-and-legal-research.html: March 9, 2007

This product is being offered for viewing through the blog's inline text.

2. Nolo is the copyright owner of this product, Living Together: A Legal Guide.

3. You may contact me as follows:
[private]
Corporate Counsel
Nolo
[private]
Berkeley, CA [private]
[private]
[private]@nolo.com

4. I have a good faith belief that use of copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right taht is allegedly infringed.

6.[private]
